text: Jill Irving (born April 4, 1963) is a Canadian Equestrian Team athlete in dressage. She is reigning Pan American Games champion in team dressage, when she won gold in 2019 in Lima. Irving was born in and grew up in Ontario but has resided in Moncton, New Brunswick since her early 20s. ==References== ==External links== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian female equestrians Category:Equestrians at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Canada Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian Category:Sportspeople from Greater Sudbury Category:Sportspeople from Moncton
title: Jill Irving
